Row.Text: Greetings. All are welcome here in our peaceful little country.
I bid you welcome to Uruguay. Perhaps you'd like to join us for an asado?
What a shame. I'd have preferred it if you didn't do that.
Our people are now eating your beef and playing your football. I worry the rest of the world will soon succumb to the sheer force of your culture - or, failing that, your midfielders.
